localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: We built this product to let you receive your packages at a nearby pickup point...no more worrying about package theft, missed deliveries, or planning your day around when the delivery man is coming. We have ~1,000 locations all around the country.
blogPost.body: We built this product to let you receive your packages at a nearby pickup point...no more worrying about package theft, missed deliveries, or planning your day around when the delivery man is coming. We have ~1,000 locations all around the country.
blogPost.title: Bounce Package Acceptance - Ship your packages to a nearby shop
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 我们打造的这款产品可以让您在附近的取件点接收包裹......不用再担心包裹被盗、错过送货，也不用再担心送货员何时到来而规划您的一天。我们在全国各地有大约1000个地点。
localize.tagline: 运送您的包裹到附近的商店

localize.description: 我們打造的這款產品可以讓您在附近的取件點接收包裹......不用再擔心包裹被盜、錯過送貨，也不用再擔心送貨員何時到來而規劃您的一天。我們在全國各地有大約1000個地點。
localize.tagline: 運送您的包裹到附近的商店

previous.excerpt: It takes hours to find a code snippet or tutorial that actually works. And double that when you search for it again. We help you save & access your code in less than 5 secs with our web app, Chrome & IDE extensions. Just right-click and save!
previous.title: thiscodeWorks - Save and share code that works

localize.description: 要找到一个真正有效的代码片段或教程需要几个小时。而当你再次搜索它时，则需要花费双倍的时间。我们通过我们的网络应用、Chrome和IDE扩展帮助您在5秒内保存和访问您的代码。只需右键点击并保存!
localize.tagline: 保存和分享有效的代码

localize.description: 要找到一個真正有效的代碼片段或教程需要幾個小時。而當你再次搜索它時，則需要花費雙倍的時間。我們通過我們的網絡應用、Chrome和IDE擴展幫助您在5秒內保存和訪問您的代碼。只需右鍵點擊並保存!
localize.tagline: 保存和分享有效的代碼
